title: Power BI Tooltips and report performance
excerpt: Patrick looks at a customer scenario where he found Power BI tooltips causing report performance issues. He shows how to identify and then a possible solution.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://twitter.com/awsaxton -- http://twitter.com/patrickdba -- http://www.facebook.com/guyinacube
